description: Modified after V. Rich, 2/10/07: DNA extraction protocol from 25 mm 0.2 μm filters – Low-throughput, using DNeasy columns (based on lab Steripak filter extraction protocol and the Suzuki et al. 2001 protocol)
protocol_affiliation: Matthew Sullivan Lab, University of Arizona/Ohio State University

authors_list.name: Virginia Rich
authors_list.affiliation: Matthew Sullivan Lab, University of Arizona/Ohio State University

guidelines:
Materials: 

Product Vendor Cat #
Sucrose, molecular biology grade FISHER  
Lysozyme  Sigma L7651-1G
Proteinase K, PCR grade Roche  
10% SDS    
96-100% EtOH    
Microcons 30 (now amicon) Millipore  
Qiagen DNeasy Tissue Kit Qiagen

components.data:
Prepare 2x lysis buffer and add to the volume of sample so that its final concentration is 1x.

Final concentration, 1x For  10 ml 2x lysis buffer For 2 ml 2x lysis buffer
40 mM EDTA 1.6 ml 0.5 M EDTA 0.32
50 mM Tris (pH 8.3) 1.0 ml 1 M TrisHCl (pH 8.3) 0.2
0.75 M Sucrose 5.13 g Sucrose 1.026
  QS to 10 ml (MQ water) QS to 2 ml
components.name: Description

components.data: Filter-sterilize through 0.2 μm.

components.data: Lysis Buffer
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Lysis Buffer

components.data:
Prepare 2x Lysis buffer with Lysozyme & RNase (1): right before use add to 1 ml aliquot of lysis buffer:

Final concentration, 1x For 1 ml, 2x For 5 ml, 2x
1.15 mg/ml lysozyme 3.30 mg lysozyme (0.003 g) 16.5 mg (0.0165 g)
200 mg/ml RNase 100 mg/ml 4 ml RNase 100 mg/ml 20 ul
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Prepare 2x Lysis buffer with Lysozyme & RNase (1): right before use add to 1 ml aliquot of lysis buffer:

Final concentration, 1x For 1 ml, 2x For 5 ml, 2x
1.15 mg/ml lysozyme 3.30 mg lysozyme (0.003 g) 16.5 mg (0.0165 g)
200 mg/ml RNase 100 mg/ml 4 ml RNase 100 mg/ml 20 ul

components.data: Dilute the 2x lysis buffer 1:1 with MQ water.

components.data: Lysis Buffer
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Lysis Buffer

components.data:
Weigh out minimum amount of ProtK, then add the appropriate amount of lysis buffer:


Final concentration, 1x For 1 ml, 1x For 100 ml, 1x
10 mg/ml 10 mg ProtK 1 mg ProtK (0.001 g)
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Weigh out minimum amount of ProtK, then add the appropriate amount of lysis buffer:


Final concentration, 1x For 1 ml, 1x For 100 ml, 1x
10 mg/ml 10 mg ProtK 1 mg ProtK (0.001 g)

components.data: Add 1 volume of 2x Lysis buffer with Lysozyme & RNase to 1 volume of sorted cells. Note down volumes and resulting volume V1.
components.name: Description

components.data: Cell lysis & RNA removal
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cell lysis & RNA removal

components.data: Incubate at 37°C for 30 min, rotating end-over-end at angle (OR: in the shaking incubator @ 100 rpm, vertical), for optimal mixing with minimal frothing; alternatively, shake vertically @ 100 rpm on shaking incubator and invert 10 times every 10 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate at 37°C for 30 min, rotating end-over-end at angle (OR: in the shaking incubator @ 100 rpm, vertical), for optimal mixing with minimal frothing; alternatively, shake vertically @ 100 rpm on shaking incubator and invert 10 times every 10 min.

components.data: Cell lysis & RNA removal
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Cell lysis & RNA removal

components.data: Add V1*0.07 μl of ProtK lysis buffer (2) to a final concentration of 0.65 mg/ml. Note down volumes, including resulting volume V2.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add V1*0.07 μl of ProtK lysis buffer (2) to a final concentration of 0.65 mg/ml. Note down volumes, including resulting volume V2.

components.data: Add V2/9 μl of 10% SDS to a final concentration of 1%. Note down volumes.

components.name: Section

components.data: Incubate at 55°C for 2 hours, rotating end-over-end at angle (OR: in the shaking incubator @ 100 rpm, vertical; invert every 20 min 10 times)
